1129040.name: VZX Player - Particle Bliss
1129040.description:
This pack contains 7 visuals based on particle effects.

The visuals are the following:
  • Anemone: A slow, smooth water-like effect.
  • Beams of Fire: Pulsating rotating particle beams with interesting shapes.
  • Cosmic Cloud: Two gas clouds colliding in space.
  • Exploding Star: A highly reactive pink blue exploding pulsating particle effect.
  • Exploding Star (Slow): A slower version of Exploding Star.
  • Fabric of Sound: 8 octaves acting as gravity points and coloring the fabric.
  • Star Swirl: Smooth swirling cluster of stars.
1129040.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 瑞典语
